summary: The module defines dataset classes for information-retrieval tasks. It implements a base class that prepares query-passage pairs, handling tokenization, length constraints, and loading data from common formats. A derived class specializes this for BERT-based retrieval, managing indexing, length reporting, and conversion of raw queries into segmented passages suitable for model input.
business_intent: Enable efficient preparation and feeding of query-passage data to NLP retrieval models, particularly BERT, to support training, validation, and inference pipelines in information-retrieval applications.
